parts=[Part(
  text='{"game_mode": "character", "user_id": "browser-test-1771310129", "selected_prompts": [], "use_default_world": false, "story_history": [{"text": "Character: A curious scholar seeking forgotten knowledge. | Setting: A quiet library filled with ancient tomes | Description: Browser test campaign", "mode": "god", "actor": "user", "sequence_id": 1}, {"text": "The Athenaeum of Forgotten Lore envelops you in comfortable silence. Towering shelves of ancient tomes stretch toward the vaulted ceiling, their leather spines cracked and faded by centuries. Dust motes dance in shafts of pale light filtering through stained glass windows. The scent of aged parchment and binding glue fills the air.\\n\\nYou\'ve spent years studying at this legendary library, yet today something catches your eye\\u2014a tome wedged behind a shelf in the Restricted Archives section, its cover bearing symbols you\'ve never seen in all your scholarly travels. The air around it seems to shimmer faintly, as if the book itself is keeping secrets.", "actor": "gemini", "sequence_id": 2}, {"text": "Start Adventure", "mode": "character", "actor": "user", "sequence_id": 3}, {"mode": "character", "text": "Morning (10:00:00) in the Restricted Archives finds you standing before the hidden tome, your scholar\'s heart racing with curiosity. The book itself seems to resist your gaze\\u2014its cover bears symbols in a language long forgotten, and the leather feels warm to the touch, almost like a living thing. Faint whispers seem to echo from within its pages, though the library remains silent around you.\\n\\nThe Restricted Archives are seldom visited. The last librarian who ventured here reportedly disappeared three centuries ago, leaving only cryptic notes about \\"truths the world was not ready to know.\\" Yet the temptation is overwhelming\\u2014this could be the discovery of a lifetime, perhaps even the key to understanding the fundamental nature of magic itself.\\n\\nDo you dare open the mysterious tome, or might there be safer paths to knowledge?", "sequence_id": 4, "actor": "gemini"}], "core_memories": ["CORE MEMORY LOG (SUMMARY OF KEY EVENTS):\\\\n- [auto] Morning (10:00:00) in the Restricted Archives finds you standing before the hidden tome, your scholar\'s heart racing with curiosity. parts=[Part(
  text='{"session_header":"[SESSION_HEADER]\\nTimestamp: 1492 DR, Mirtul 15, 10:00:00\\nLocation: The Athenaeum of Forgotten Lore - Restricted Archives\\nStatus: Lvl 1 Wizard | HP: 6/6 | XP: 0/300 | Spells: L1 2/2, L2 0/1","narrative":"You lean closer to the mysterious tome, studying the strange symbols etched into its leather cover. As a scholar of the arcane, you\'ve encountered many exotic scripts\\u2014Eltharic, Runic, even fragments of Primordial\\u2014but these markings are unlike anything in your vast knowledge. They seem to shift subtly when you\'re not looking directly at them, and the faint whispers you heard earlier grow slightly louder, almost as if the book senses your attention.","tool_requests":[{"tool":"roll_skill_check","args":{"skill":"arcana","modifier":5,"dc":15,"dc_reasoning":"Unknown symbols from a forgotten language with apparent magical properties","purpose":"Study the mysterious tome\'s symbols"}}],"planning_block":{"thinking":"The symbols are clearly magical in nature\\u2014the shifting quality confirms this isn\'t merely an obscure language but something actively enchanted. My Arcana training should help me decipher some of these markings, though the whispered sounds suggest the book may be warded or even sentient. I need to be methodical.","context":"Arcana check to identify mysterious tome","choices":{"examine_tome":{"text":"Continue Examining","description":"Press closer to read the symbols, following their patterns","risk_level":"medium","confidence":"medium"},"open_carefully":{"text":"Open Carefully","description":"Attempt to open the tome while continuing to study it","risk_level":"high","confidence":"low"},"step_back":{"text":"Step Back","description":"Take a measured distance to reassess the situation","risk_level":"low","confidence":"high"}}},"state_updates":{"world_data":{"world_time":{"hour":10,"minute":5,"second":0}}}},"entities_mentioned":["The Scholar"],"location_confirmed":"The Athenaeum of Forgotten Lore - Restricted Archives"}}'
)] role='model'

parts=[Part(
  text="""Tool results (use these exact numbers in your narrative):

If any dice were rolled, you MUST include them in action_resolution.mechanics.rolls (or action_resolution.mechanics.audit_events) using the exact results above. Do NOT invent rolls. Do NOT populate dice_rolls directly. Now write the final response using these results. Do NOT include tool_requests in your response."""
)] role='user'

Let me craft a response that:

2. Narrates the success of the Arcana check
3. Provides new choices in the planning block
4. Maintains the immersive narrative style

content.text:
{"session_header":"[SESSION_HEADER]
Timestamp: 1492 DR, Mirtul 15, 10:05:00
Location: The Athenaeum of Forgotten Lore - Restricted Archives
Status: Lvl 1 Wizard | HP: 6/6 | XP: 0/300 | Spells: L1 2/2, L2 0/1","narrative":"Your years of arcane study serve you well. As you trace the strange symbols with your fingertips, their meaning begins to crystallize in your mind—not fully deciphered, but revealed in fragmentary visions. These are wards, you realize. Protective seals of tremendous age, binding something within the tome. The whispers coalesce into something almost like words: fragments of an ancient warning.

**You've learned:** The tome is a **Bound Archive**—a repository of forbidden knowledge sealed by wizards long dead. The wards are dormant but responsive; they activated when you drew near, suggesting the book has been waiting. Whatever lies within was meant to be found... or perhaps released.

The leather grows warmer under your touch, and for a moment, you glimpse something in the symbols—a pattern, a name, perhaps a key. But it slips away before you can grasp it fully.","planning_block":{"thinking":"The book responds to attention, which confirms it's more than an ordinary tome. The wards are dormant but active—this was sealed deliberately, not merely forgotten. I have a choice: push further into the book's mysteries, attempt to open it despite the warnings, or step back and reconsider my approach. The whispers suggest the book has been waiting... but waiting for what, exactly?","context":"Successful Arcana check revealed tome is a Bound Archive","choices":{"decipher_fully":{"text":"Decipher the Wards Completely","description":"Spend more time studying to fully understand the wards and their purpose","risk_level":"medium","confidence":"high","pros":["Complete understanding of the tome's nature","May reveal how to safely open it","In-character scholarly thoroughness"],"cons":["Time in a potentially dangerous location","May trigger additional ward responses"]},"open_carefully":{"text":"Open the Bound Archive","description":"Attempt to break the seals and access the forbidden knowledge within","risk_level":"high","confidence":"low","pros":["Immediate access to potentially immense knowledge","The wards seem dormant, not hostile"],"cons":["Unknown consequences of breaking ancient seals","Could release something dangerous"]},"seek_guidance":{"text":"Seek the Head Librarian","description":"Return to the main hall and consult the head librarian about this discovery","risk_level":"safe","confidence":"high","pros":["Expert historical knowledge","May know the book's history","Safer approach"],"cons":["May lose access to the tome","Time-consuming"]}},"action_resolution":{"mechanics":{"type":"skill_check","rolls":[{"notation":"1d20+5","result":17,"total":22,"dc":15,"success":true,"purpose":"Arcana check to identify mysterious tome","dc_reasoning":"Unknown symbols from a forgotten language with apparent magical properties"}]},"reinterpreted":false,"audit_flags":[]},"state_updates":{"world_data":{"world_time":{"hour":10,"minute":10,"second":0}}},"entities_mentioned":["The Scholar","Bound Archive"],"location_confirmed":"The Athenaeum of Forgotten Lore - Restricted Archives"}
